header.description: The Sterling B2B Integrator plug-in enables access to common functionality for starting services and importing files.

step-type.name: Start B2Bi
step-type.description: Starts all B2B services, including all ASI services plus all adapter container(s) and the webDAV server

property-ui.description: Full path to the Sterling home directory.
property-ui.label: Sterling Home

step-type.name: Stop B2Bi
step-type.description: Stops all B2BI services, including all ASI services plus all adapter container(s) and the webDAV server

property-ui.description: Full path to the Sterling home directory.
property-ui.label: Sterling Home

step-type.name: Get Service Status
step-type.description: Get the Status of service (up or done), by browse

step-type.description: Restart widnows server. Quit after the command submitted immediately. This method is also available in fully supported Windows System Tools plug-in.
